item.name: Amulet of Health +2
item.description: This amulet is a golden disk on a chain. It usually bears the image of a lion or other powerful animal. The amulet grants the wearer an enhancement bonus to Constitution of +2, +4, or +6.

creation.prerequisites: Craft Wondrous Item, bear’s endurance

item.name: Amulet of Health +4
item.description: This amulet is a golden disk on a chain. It usually bears the image of a lion or other powerful animal. The amulet grants the wearer an enhancement bonus to Constitution of +2, +4, or +6.

creation.prerequisites: Craft Wondrous Item, bear’s endurance

item.name: Amulet of Health +6
item.description: This amulet is a golden disk on a chain. It usually bears the image of a lion or other powerful animal. The amulet grants the wearer an enhancement bonus to Constitution of +2, +4, or +6.

creation.prerequisites: Craft Wondrous Item, bear’s endurance

item.name: Amulet of Mighty Fists +1
item.description: This amulet grants an enhancement bonus of +1 to +5 on attack and damage rolls with unarmed attacks and natural weapons.

creation.prerequisites: Craft Wondrous Item, greater magic fang, creator’s caster level must be at least three times the amulet’s bonus

item.name: Amulet of Mighty Fists +2
item.description: This amulet grants an enhancement bonus of +1 to +5 on attack and damage rolls with unarmed attacks and natural weapons.

creation.prerequisites: Craft Wondrous Item, greater magic fang, creator’s caster level must be at least three times the amulet’s bonus

item.name: Amulet of Mighty Fists +3
item.description: This amulet grants an enhancement bonus of +1 to +5 on attack and damage rolls with unarmed attacks and natural weapons.

creation.prerequisites: Craft Wondrous Item, greater magic fang, creator’s caster level must be at least three times the amulet’s bonus

item.name: Amulet of Mighty Fists +4
item.description: This amulet grants an enhancement bonus of +1 to +5 on attack and damage rolls with unarmed attacks and natural weapons.

creation.prerequisites: Craft Wondrous Item, greater magic fang, creator’s caster level must be at least three times the amulet’s bonus

item.name: Amulet of Mighty Fists +5
item.description: This amulet grants an enhancement bonus of +1 to +5 on attack and damage rolls with unarmed attacks and natural weapons.

creation.prerequisites: Craft Wondrous Item, greater magic fang, creator’s caster level must be at least three times the amulet’s bonus

item.name: Amulet of Natural Armor +1
item.description: This amulet, usually crafted from bone or beast scales, toughens the wearer’s body and flesh, giving him an enhancement bonus to his natural armor bonus of from +1 to +5, depending on the kind of amulet.

creation.prerequisites: Craft Wondrous Item, barkskin, creator’s caster level must be at least three times the amulet’s bonus

item.name: Amulet of Natural Armor +2
item.description: This amulet, usually crafted from bone or beast scales, toughens the wearer’s body and flesh, giving him an enhancement bonus to his natural armor bonus of from +1 to +5, depending on the kind of amulet.

creation.prerequisites: Craft Wondrous Item, barkskin, creator’s caster level must be at least three times the amulet’s bonus

item.name: Amulet of Natural Armor +3
item.description: This amulet, usually crafted from bone or beast scales, toughens the wearer’s body and flesh, giving him an enhancement bonus to his natural armor bonus of from +1 to +5, depending on the kind of amulet.

creation.prerequisites: Craft Wondrous Item, barkskin, creator’s caster level must be at least three times the amulet’s bonus

item.name: Amulet of Natural Armor +4
item.description: This amulet, usually crafted from bone or beast scales, toughens the wearer’s body and flesh, giving him an enhancement bonus to his natural armor bonus of from +1 to +5, depending on the kind of amulet.

creation.prerequisites: Craft Wondrous Item, barkskin, creator’s caster level must be at least three times the amulet’s bonus

item.name: Amulet of Natural Armor +5
item.description: This amulet, usually crafted from bone or beast scales, toughens the wearer’s body and flesh, giving him an enhancement bonus to his natural armor bonus of from +1 to +5, depending on the kind of amulet.

creation.prerequisites: Craft Wondrous Item, barkskin, creator’s caster level must be at least three times the amulet’s bonus

item.name: Amulet of the Planes
item.description: This device usually appears to be a black circular amulet, although any character looking closely at it sees a dark, moving swirl of color. The amulet allows its wearer to utilize plane shift. However, this is a difficult item to master. The user must make a DC 15 Intelligence check in order to get the amulet to take her to the plane (and the specific location on that plane) that she wants. If she fails, the amulet transports her and all those traveling with her to a random location on that plane (01–60 on d%) or to a random plane (61–100).

creation.prerequisites: Craft Wondrous Item, plane shift

item.name: Amulet of Proof against Detection and Location
item.description: This silver amulet protects the wearer from scrying and magical location just as a nondetection spell does. If a divination spell is attempted against the wearer, the caster of the divination must succeed on a caster level check (1d20 + caster level) against a DC of 19 (as if the caster had cast nondetection on herself ).

creation.prerequisites: Craft Wondrous Item, nondetection

item.name: Belt of Giant Strength +4
item.description: This wide belt is made of thick leather and studded with iron. The belt adds to the wearer’s Strength score in the form of an enhancement bonus of +4 or +6.

creation.prerequisites: Craft Wondrous Item, bull’s strength

item.name: Belt of Giant Strength +6
item.description: This wide belt is made of thick leather and studded with iron. The belt adds to the wearer’s Strength score in the form of an enhancement bonus of +4 or +6.

creation.prerequisites: Craft Wondrous Item, bull’s strength

item.name: Boots of Elvenkind
item.description: These soft boots enable the wearer to move quietly in virtually any surroundings, granting a +5 competence bonus on Move Silently checks.

creation.prerequisites: Craft Wondrous Item, creator must be an elf

item.name: Boots of Striding and Springing
item.description: These boots increase the wearer’s base land speed by 10 feet. In addition to this striding ability (considered an enhancement bonus), these boots allow the wearer to make great leaps. She can jump with a +5 competence bonus on Jump checks.

creation.prerequisites: Craft Wondrous Item, longstrider, creator must have 5 ranks in the Jump skill

item.name: Bracers of Armor +1
item.description: These items appear to be wrist or arm guards. They surround the wearer with an invisible but tangible field of force, granting him an armor bonus of +1 to +8, just as though he were wearing armor. Both bracers must be worn for the magic to be effective.

creation.prerequisites: Craft Wondrous Item, mage armor, creator’s caster level must be at least two times that of the bonus placed in the bracers

item.name: Bracers of Armor +2
item.description: These items appear to be wrist or arm guards. They surround the wearer with an invisible but tangible field of force, granting him an armor bonus of +1 to +8, just as though he were wearing armor. Both bracers must be worn for the magic to be effective.

creation.prerequisites: Craft Wondrous Item, mage armor, creator’s caster level must be at least two times that of the bonus placed in the bracers

item.description: These items appear to be wrist or arm guards. They surround the wearer with an invisible but tangible field of force, granting him an armor bonus of +1 to +8, just as though he were wearing armor. Both bracers must be worn for the magic to be effective.

creation.prerequisites: Craft Wondrous Item, mage armor, creator’s caster level must be at least two times that of the bonus placed in the bracers

item.description: These items appear to be wrist or arm guards. They surround the wearer with an invisible but tangible field of force, granting him an armor bonus of +1 to +8, just as though he were wearing armor. Both bracers must be worn for the magic to be effective.

item.description: These items appear to be wrist or arm guards. They surround the wearer with an invisible but tangible field of force, granting him an armor bonus of +1 to +8, just as though he were wearing armor. Both bracers must be worn for the magic to be effective.

creation.prerequisites: Craft Wondrous Item, mage armor, creator’s caster level must be at least two times that of the bonus placed in the bracers

item.description: These items appear to be wrist or arm guards. They surround the wearer with an invisible but tangible field of force, granting him an armor bonus of +1 to +8, just as though he were wearing armor. Both bracers must be worn for the magic to be effective.

creation.prerequisites: Craft Wondrous Item, mage armor, creator’s caster level must be at least two times that of the bonus placed in the bracers

item.name: Cloak of Charisma +2
item.description: This lightweight and fashionable cloak has a highly decorative silver trim. When in a character’s possession, it adds a +2, +4, or +6 enhancement bonus to her Charisma score.

creation.prerequisites: Craft Wondrous Item, eagle’s splendor

item.name: Cloak of Charisma +4
item.description: This lightweight and fashionable cloak has a highly decorative silver trim. When in a character’s possession, it adds a +2, +4, or +6 enhancement bonus to her Charisma score.

creation.prerequisites: Craft Wondrous Item, eagle’s splendor

item.name: Cloak of Charisma +6
item.description: This lightweight and fashionable cloak has a highly decorative silver trim. When in a character’s possession, it adds a +2, +4, or +6 enhancement bonus to her Charisma score.

creation.prerequisites: Craft Wondrous Item, eagle’s splendor

item.name: Cloak of Displacement, Minor
item.description: This item appears to be a normal cloak, but when worn by a character its magical properties distort and warp light waves. This displacement works similar to the displacement spell except that it only grants a 20% miss chance on attacks against the wearer. It functions continually.

creation.prerequisites: Craft Wondrous Item, displacement

item.name: Cloak of Elvenkind
item.description: This cloak of neutral gray cloth is indistinguishable from an ordinary cloak of the same color. However, when worn with the hood drawn up around the head, it gives the wearer a +5 competence bonus on Hide checks.

creation.prerequisites: Craft Wondrous Item, invisibility, creator must be an elf

item.name: Cloak of Resistance +1
item.description: These garments offer magic protection in the form of a +1 to +5 resistance bonus on all saving throws (Fortitude, Reflex, and Will).

creation.prerequisites: Craft Wondrous Item, resistance, creator’s caster level must be at least three times the cloak’s bonus

item.name: Cloak of Resistance +2
item.description: These garments offer magic protection in the form of a +1 to +5 resistance bonus on all saving throws (Fortitude, Reflex, and Will).

creation.prerequisites: Craft Wondrous Item, resistance, creator’s caster level must be at least three times the cloak’s bonus

item.name: Cloak of Resistance +3
item.description: These garments offer magic protection in the form of a +1 to +5 resistance bonus on all saving throws (Fortitude, Reflex, and Will).

creation.prerequisites: Craft Wondrous Item, resistance, creator’s caster level must be at least three times the cloak’s bonus

item.name: Cloak of Resistance +4
item.description: These garments offer magic protection in the form of a +1 to +5 resistance bonus on all saving throws (Fortitude, Reflex, and Will).

creation.prerequisites: Craft Wondrous Item, resistance, creator’s caster level must be at least three times the cloak’s bonus

item.name: Cloak of Resistance +5
item.description: These garments offer magic protection in the form of a +1 to +5 resistance bonus on all saving throws (Fortitude, Reflex, and Will).

creation.prerequisites: Craft Wondrous Item, resistance, creator’s caster level must be at least three times the cloak’s bonus

item.name: Eyes of the Eagle
item.description: These items are made of special crystal and fit over the eyes of the wearer. These lenses grant a +5 competence bonus on Spot checks. Wearing only one of the pair causes a character to become dizzy and, in effect, stunned for 1 round. Thereafter, the wearer can use the single lens without being stunned so long as she covers her other eye. Of course, she can remove the single lens and see normally at any time, or wear both lenses to end or avoid the dizziness.

creation.prerequisites: Craft Wondrous Item, clairaudience/clairvoyance

item.name: Gauntlets of Ogre Power
item.description: These gauntlets are made of tough leather with iron studs running across the back of the hands and fingers. They grant the wearer great strength, adding a +2 enhancement bonus to his Strength score. Both gauntlets must be worn for the magic to be effective.

creation.prerequisites: Craft Wondrous Item, bull’s strength

item.name: Gloves of Dexterity +2
item.description: These thin leather gloves are very flexible and allow for delicate manipulation. They add to the wearer’s Dexterity score in the form of an enhancement bonus of +2, +4, or +6. Both gloves must be worn for the magic to be effective.

creation.prerequisites: Craft Wondrous Item, cat’s grace

item.name: Gloves of Dexterity +4
item.description: These thin leather gloves are very flexible and allow for delicate manipulation. They add to the wearer’s Dexterity score in the form of an enhancement bonus of +2, +4, or +6. Both gloves must be worn for the magic to be effective.

creation.prerequisites: Craft Wondrous Item, cat’s grace

item.name: Gloves of Dexterity +6
item.description: These thin leather gloves are very flexible and allow for delicate manipulation. They add to the wearer’s Dexterity score in the form of an enhancement bonus of +2, +4, or +6. Both gloves must be worn for the magic to be effective.

creation.prerequisites: Craft Wondrous Item, cat’s grace

item.name: Gloves of Swimming and Climbing
item.description: These apparently normal lightweight gloves grant a +5 competence bonus on Swim checks and Climb checks. Both gloves must be worn for the magic to be effective.

creation.prerequisites: Craft Wondrous Item, bull’s strength, cat’s grace

item.name: Goggles of Minute Seeing
item.description: The lenses of this item are made of special crystal. When placed over the eyes of the wearer, the lenses enable her to see much better than normal at distances of 1 foot or less, granting her a +5 competence bonus on Search checks to find secret doors, traps, and similar concealed objects. Both lenses must be worn for the magic to be effective.

creation.prerequisites: Craft Wondrous Item, true seeing

modifier.condition: to find secret doors, traps, and similar concealed objects

item.name: Headband of Intellect +2
item.description: This device is a light cord with a small gem set so that it rests upon the forehead of the wearer. The headband adds to the wearer’s Intelligence score in the form of an enhancement bonus of +2, +4, or +6. This enhancement bonus does not earn the wearer extra skill points when a new level is attained; use the unenhanced Intelligence bonus to determine skill points.

creation.prerequisites: Craft Wondrous Item, fox’s cunning

item.name: Headband of Intellect +4
item.description: This device is a light cord with a small gem set so that it rests upon the forehead of the wearer. The headband adds to the wearer’s Intelligence score in the form of an enhancement bonus of +2, +4, or +6. This enhancement bonus does not earn the wearer extra skill points when a new level is attained; use the unenhanced Intelligence bonus to determine skill points.

creation.prerequisites: Craft Wondrous Item, fox’s cunning

item.name: Headband of Intellect +6
item.description: This device is a light cord with a small gem set so that it rests upon the forehead of the wearer. The headband adds to the wearer’s Intelligence score in the form of an enhancement bonus of +2, +4, or +6. This enhancement bonus does not earn the wearer extra skill points when a new level is attained; use the unenhanced Intelligence bonus to determine skill points.

creation.prerequisites: Craft Wondrous Item, fox’s cunning

item.name: Helm of Comprehend Languages and Read Magic
item.description: Appearing as a normal helmet, a helm of comprehend languages and read magic grants its wearer the ability to understand the spoken words of any creature and to read text in any language and any magical writing. The wearer gains a +5 competence bonus on Decipher Script checks to understand messages written in incomplete, archaic, or exotic forms. Note that understanding a magical text does not necessarily imply spell use.

creation.prerequisites: Craft Wondrous Item, comprehend languages, read magic

modifier.condition: to understand messages written in incomplete, archaic, or exotic forms

item.name: Lens of Detection
item.description: This circular prism enables its user to detect minute details, granting a +5 bonus on Search checks. It also aids in following tracks, adding a +5 bonus on Survival checks when tracking. The lens is about 6 inches in diameter and set in a frame with a handle.

creation.prerequisites: Craft Wondrous Item, true seeing

item.name: Mantle of Spell Resistance
item.description: This garment, worn over normal clothing or armor, grants the wearer spell resistance 21.

creation.prerequisites: Craft Wondrous Item, spell resistance

item.name: Periapt of Wisdom +2
item.description: Although it appears to be a normal pearl on a light chain, a periapt of wisdom actually increases the possessor’s Wisdom score in the form of an enhancement bonus of +2, +4, or +6 (depending on the individual item).

creation.prerequisites: Craft Wondrous Item, owl’s wisdom

item.name: Periapt of Wisdom +4
item.description: Although it appears to be a normal pearl on a light chain, a periapt of wisdom actually increases the possessor’s Wisdom score in the form of an enhancement bonus of +2, +4, or +6 (depending on the individual item).

creation.prerequisites: Craft Wondrous Item, owl’s wisdom

item.name: Periapt of Wisdom +6
item.description: Although it appears to be a normal pearl on a light chain, a periapt of wisdom actually increases the possessor’s Wisdom score in the form of an enhancement bonus of +2, +4, or +6 (depending on the individual item).

creation.prerequisites: Craft Wondrous Item, owl’s wisdom

item.name: Vest of Escape
item.description: Hidden within secret pockets of this simple silk vest are lockpicks that provide a +4 competence bonus on Open Lock checks. The vest also grants its wearer a +6 competence bonus on Escape Artist checks.

creation.prerequisites: Craft Wondrous Item, knock, grease
